title: Viral TikTok & Reels Editor (Swimsuit Brand)
job_overview:
We are a fast-growing swimsuit company looking for an editor who can hook viewers in the first 1–3 seconds and turn raw clips into scroll-stopping TikToks and Instagram Reels.

What you’ll do
• Craft short-form videos with bold openers (we have lots of content)
• Add captions, effects, and sound that fit our vibe
• Deliver files ready for TikTok and Instagram using any editing platform you prefer

Trial & Pay
• One-week paid trial; your edits go live and we track performance
• After the trial, earn steady base pay plus a bonus for every reel or TikTok that hits our viral benchmark

What we’re looking for
• Portfolio with proven viral results
• Fast turnaround and strong English communication

How to apply
Send your three best video links and a little about yourself
